title: Workshops as Worksites on the Digital World

summary.description: Spencer and I got together to answer these questions and in the process went massively over the scheduled time. It's that good.
summary.guest: Spencer Ayres is an expert at running workshops that get results and a friend. After I saw the beautiful work he's been doing at Jointly.Work, I knew I had found a kindred mind.

topics: What makes Workshops so good for productizing Expertise?
What do the best workshops have in common?
What's the future of Expertise work and how Facilitation fits into it?
